title: No audio on some videos
content:
Videos from vidplay/mycloud/mp4upload on various video streaming sites do not have audio. Videos have working audio on other browsers. Only filemoon server seems to be working so far. Issue persists with troubleshooting mode

Using Win10, firefox nightly 120.0a1, has persisted for a few updates.
creator: guwesley

content: My firefox browser freezes completely and stops PC from working. Current remedy is to use another browser having switched off and re-booted PC. Any thoughts as this has started happening frollowing update to version 118

title: Pesquisa Utilizando o Ctrl+F em PDF aberto no proprio Navegador
content: Peço Ajuda Por Favor. Ao Abrir um PDF no firefox, não consigo realizar pesquisa utilizando o Ctrl + F. Ele Faz a busca, porém não apresenta na tela. Tenho que Descer ou Subir para ver a seleção. Ele até destaca a palavra pesquisada, porém não mostra na tela. Tenho que arrastar para procurar. Ja procurei em tudo quanto é lugar na internet e não consigo explicação para isso. Ja atualizei o Navegador e tb nao resolveu. Tentei ajuda com a equipe de T.I da empresa e tb nao conseguiram. Uso muito essa função para fazer levantamentos no meu trabalho. Preciso muito de ajuda.
creator: helioprojec1

title: Restore bookmarks from account
content: Hi, I recently reinstalled windows, before that I wanted to make a backup of my data from firefox, addons, bookmarks, history and cookies. When I looked into google it redirected me to this page https://support.mozilla.org/pl/kb/firefox-backup-danych-przechodzenie-na-nowe-urzadzenie Great! I thought. I was logged in, synchronized and was ready to go. After installing new windows, I downloaded firefox, logged in, and nothing... no button to restore my addons or any data. So I searched far and wide and still didn't find anything. Please tell me how to restore my data it was synced.
creator: tobi1560

title: Dynamics 365 App required sign in again and again to use after update to Firefox 118 and beta 119
content:
Hi Team,

After updated to latest version of Firefox - 118, we facing with this issue: Dynamics 365 App required sign in again and again to use. We need to click on sign in at least 3 times, but no need to provide the credential.

Checking the network log, seeing this: error_description "AADSTS700084: The refresh token was issued to a single page app (SPA), and therefore has a fixed, limited lifetime of 1.00:00:00, which cannot be extended. It is now expired and a new sign in request must be sent by the SPA to the sign in page. The token was issued on 2023-10-09T07:45:27.2163809Z. Trace ID: 07fa536f-3cd8-4f91-9950-66dc69928b00 Correlation ID: 594b0d6f-0dab-48e4-900d-f92b8a382eba Timestamp: 2023-10-11 08:46:36Z"
creator: mx1

title: Downgraded from Windows 11 to Windows 10, syncing completely broke
content: I had several dozen tabs open, as well as bookmarks saved that were on my account while I was using Windows 11. I didn't even think to export the bookmarks and other information, as I figured sync would handle that. Unfortunately, none of my settings have been saved. Is there a way to fix this? I had many extensions, bookmarks, and tabs I'd like to recover.

title: How to automatically back up bookmarks to device
content:
Hi, how to automatically save or "backup" bookmarks to my account?

So that let's suppose I go to another computer, open up my account, and all my bookmarks will be there?

My computer got reset and all data deleted, and when I logged into FF again, all the bookmarks were gone.

I don't want to manually backup my bookmarks, it should be done automatically and connected to the account and stored on the FF server.

How to do this, is there even a way?
creator: resolve.famous

title: Firefox and Firefox dev Not Opening Only When Not In Windows Safe Mode
content:
I've been having trouble with firefox.exe and even the dev installer. The Installer work adds it to one of the icons to the bottom tray in windows then when I go to open it I look in task manager and one process is ran but then seems to be terminated right away. But when I reload windows in safe mode I go to open firefox.exe and it works fine except for the fact that there is no internet.

Also if this helps when hovering over the icon in the tray it doesn't show like the most recent websites. But it shows in windows safe mode.

Note I've tried a lot of things. Fully reinstalled firefox; tried to run firefox safe-mode tried to use firefox dev executable reset the base settings for Firefox tried turning off wifi doesn't matter tried making new profile

So if none of that works can you send me to a place so I can get my history data from my account, this is because I use my phone with Firefox.

python code i dont know what to do so I just trying everything to make it easier for you to help me, and I thank you.

import os try: 

   os.system("firefox.exe")    # opens then closes, not window is poped up

except: 

   # run windows in safe mode    # works but no internet

finally: 

   # contact support for that glimmer of hope
creator: loganboganfarfignogan
